biocontainers.name: flextaxd
biocontainers.summary: Script that allows the creation of custom kraken databases from various sources (ncbi, qiime, cansnper)

biotools.summary: FlexTaxD (Flexible Taxonomy Databases) - Create, add, merge different taxonomy sources (QIIME, GTDB, NCBI and more) and create metagenomic databases (kraken2, ganon and more ).

bioschemas.name: FlexTaxD
bioschemas.summary: FlexTaxD (Flexible Taxonomy Databases) - Create, add, merge different taxonomy sources (QIIME, GTDB, NCBI and more) and create metagenomic databases (kraken2, ganon and more ).
